function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of video surveillance for monitoring crowded areas","Impact":"Invasion of privacy, potential for misuse of surveillance data","Mitigation":"Implement strict privacy regulations, limit data collection and use","Technologies":"AI, IoT","People":"General public, individuals in crowded areas","Owner":"Regulatory authorities, law enforcement departments"},{"Description":"Enforcement of social distancing through technology","Impact":"Reliance on technology for public health measures, potential for bias or discrimination in enforcement","Mitigation":"Ethical use of technology, regular audits and accountability","Technologies":"AI, IoT","People":"General public","Owner":"Public health authorities, government agencies"}]}
